LocationPicker.geolocationNotSupported: Mai binciken na yanzu baya goyan bayan sayen gero
LocationPicker.getLocationFailed: Ya kasa samun wurin, don Allah a duba saitunan izini
LocationPicker.title: Sunan wuri
LocationPicker.descriptionPlaceholder: Da fatan za a shigar da cikakken bayanin (na zabi)
LocationPicker.permissionPrompt: Muna buƙatar samun bayanin wurinku don samar da ingantattun ayyuka, ana yarda dashi?
LocationPicker.permissionDenied: Ana hana izinin sa izini, don Allah a kunna izini a saitunan bincikenku
LocationPicker.locationTimeout: Matsayi lokaci, ka tabbata cewa an kunna na'urar ka yi kokarin sake yin rubutu
LocationPicker.locationUnavailable: Ba za a iya samun wurin nan na yanzu ba, don Allah a duba sabis ɗin wurin
